description.en:
The Shirakiin house's daughter, Shirakiin Ririchiyo, who has a complex about being unable to live independently and unprotected, feels the need to move out and live on her own under the condition of residing in the mansion named "Ayakashi Kan." In this mansion, only those who have cleared a very strict examination could reside in it, and for each resident, they are accompanied with one agent of the Secret Service (S.S.). Although Ririchiyo has rejected the company of the S.S., while residing in the mansion she finds out that the agent dedicated to protecting her is actually the Fox Spirit whom she previously rescued.  
  
Note: Youko x Boku SS is serialized in Gangan Joker, a shounen magazine.
description.pt-br: A vida de Ririchiyo sempre foi ofuscada pela sombra da sua rica e poderosa família. Todos que se aproximavam dela, o faziam por interesse ou para tirar sarro. Um dia, ela se cansa disso e decide sair de casa para poder viver por si só e mudar. Seus pais só aceitaram se ela fosse viver na Mansão Ayakashi, conhecida como Mansion de Ayakashi, um lugar onde as pessoas dizem ser um complexo de apartamento para celebridades e pessoas ricas, onde cada morador tem o direito de ter um agente do Serviço Secreto. É assim que ela conhece Miketsukami Soushi, um SS que jura lealdade a ela.

biography.en:
Her debut was with a work called CALLING, which she made when she was only fifteen. She chose not to go to high school so that she could draw manga. Fujiwara was a large fan of RPGs such as Final Fantasy, which shows in her works.

She was also good friends of MOCHIZUKI Jun (Pandora Hearts) and TOBOSO Yana (Kuroshitsuji).

She passed away from an illness on March 31st, 2015, at the age of 31.
Leaving her series Katsute Mahou Shoujo to Aku wa Tekitai Shite Ita, unfinished.
